item.title: What's The Best Way to Practice "Sinking the Chest?"
item.description: Sinking the chest while raising the spine is a key energetic alignment practiced in Tai Chi to facilitate a grounding, downward flow of energy. Martial artists use it to develop their root and anyone who "gets stuck in their head" will find some relief employing this principle. The question is: Do you have a good standing position to practice sinking the chest?
